casebody.data:
172 A.3d 1080 ANTHONY PACE, SR., PLAINTIFF-PETITIONER, AND DIANE PACE, HIS WIFE, PLAINTIFF, v. TOWNSHIP OF NUTLEY, TOWNSHIP OF NUTLEY POLICE DEPARTMENT, LT. KEVIN WATTS, AND POLICE OFFICER GERARD TUSA, DEFENDANTS-RESPONDENTS.

C-264 September Term 2017

079871 November 2, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005310-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
